questions.question: What is a constructor in C++?
options: A special member function that initializes objects
questions.correctAnswer: A special member function that initializes objects

questions.question: How is a constructor called?
options: Automatically when an object is created
questions.correctAnswer: Automatically when an object is created

questions.question: What is the default constructor?

questions.question: What is inheritance?
options: The ability to define a new class based on an existing class
The ability to create multiple objects from a class
questions.correctAnswer: The ability to define a new class based on an existing class

questions.question: Which keyword is used to inherit a class in C++?
What type of inheritance allows a class to inherit from multiple classes?

options: To define common attributes and behaviors
questions.correctAnswer: To define common attributes and behaviors

questions.question: What is a destructor?
options: A special member function that cleans up when an object is destroyed
questions.correctAnswer: A special member function that cleans up when an object is destroyed

questions.question: What is the difference between a constructor and a destructor?
options: Constructors initialize objects; destructors clean them up
Both are used for memory allocation
questions.correctAnswer: Constructors initialize objects; destructors clean them up
